mcq.statement: Who was one of the founders and the first president of the All-India Muslim League (AIML)?

options.a: Sir Sultan Mohammad Shah, Aga Khan III

mcq.one_liner: The All-India Muslim League (AIML) was co-founded and first presided over by **Sir Sultan Mohammad Shah, Aga Khan III**.
